title: Methods and data
summary: Trase builds on an enhanced form of material flow analysis called Spatially Explicit Information on Production to Consumption Systems (SEI-PCS) originally developed by Godar et al. 2015. A description of all the methods and data sources currently used in Trase to apply the SEI-PCS approach to map subnational trade flows can be found for each of the countries and commodities in
